name: Joshua Hines
text: This is probably my favorite large chain. The sauce is great and they put plenty of cheese on the pizzas. Also, way better and more cheese in their stuffed crust than that other guy. Lots of flavored crust options which really make the â€¦More

name: J B
text: Very good pizza.  The deep dish is delicious.  Definitely call and ask about the current specials.  The website and app aren't very accurate.

name: Christine Broadus
text: Fantastic food and great portion size on baked subs! Clean shop and friendly service. We drove extra to come get our hungry howie's fix!

name: Todd Judge
text: Sloppy pizza.  Topping slid off the pizza and were inside the box.  Ordered a half and half pizza yet not all toppings were present.  Called to complain and the manager said he made it and must have missed it.  Pizza was cut poorly.  1 â€¦More

name: Chris Norris
text: The pizza is always got and the toppings are always fresh!!

name: ivon rokko
text: pizza is ok except the fact that they forgot the 1 topping on our pizza. How dose one manage that?

name: Amanda
text: I go for their calzones. They are amazing! Salads are pretty good too and pretty nice sized. Have nice "deals" to save you some money too. :)

name: Lori Macks
text: Excellent customer service and specials. The food is always really good and made exactly like I wanted it.

name: Brian Vincent
text: I called this location because the crescent location never has good service because of either no delivery drivers or rude to guests on the phone. Trey helped me out and even said he'd pay for the delivery charge. This location just got a lifetime customer.

name: Dusty Campbell
text: The pizza is of decent quality. Pricing. Can be a  factor when it comes to what you want. But they do have some favorable  crust,  and some great deals when there on sale.

name: Andrea O'Bryan
text: Have ordered here more times than I'd like to admit (working parent) , always super fast and accurate with my orders! App will say wayyy more time than it takes for delivery! Thanks HH Covington! Y'all are rockstars ðŸ˜Ž

name: James Allen
text: Service very good, Place very clean and my order didn't take that long to prepare. Great place to go do you receive your order very quick

name: Nina Shedd
text: Don't like their pizza. I have had it several times...I am just not a fan.

name: Daniel Rumrill
text: Good pizza. Good service. We had a problem one time with our order so we called and the manager said they would credit us for next time. Next time we ordered they didn't charge us at all. â€¦More

name: Chad Csadenyi
text: Best pizza in Fort Wayne! The crust is to die for, and there Delivery times are on point!

name: Ethan Sowers
text: Bad management. I Always get late deliveries and cold food on top of that. Not great at this location others are tho

name: Amanda Kilburn
text: The service here was as crappy as it gets. I wish I could shut down the business just so no one else will have to deal with these people. They messed up my order completely and the delivery guy was trying to scam me out of more money. I had â€¦More

name: Lucas Schutt
text: Great service great food

name: Morgan Lefey
text: really tasty pizza, always arrives fast and hot.  I like their flavored crust better than certain other chains.  Decent prices.

name: Kathy Kincaid
text: First time ordering from this location. I had coupon. I don't mean to be condescending but the guy taking my order was either high or really slow to understand things. Some one next to him who I could hear very well was explaining things to â€¦More

name: Daiesha Lindsey
text: Very Clean Store & Polite Employees.  You Won't Be Disappointed! They Have The Best Deal

name: Disturbed2Link APWF
text: Low quality food topped off with horrible customer service

name: Correy D. Tubbs
text: Best pizza in town

name: Rosco Jennings
text: That 5 dollar deal with a small 2 topping is awesome. Double pepperoni with extra cajun crust!! Feel the Bern!!

name: Veronica Taylor
text: Great pizza and kind workers.  We love hungry howies they are also very affordable

name: day nor
text: They delivery area is to small and then after i had to pick up my food it wasen good lach of taste and the wings where not cook you can see some blood on it.

name: Eric Breneman
text: The hawaiian pizza had too much ham for my vegetarian needs, but the Cajun crust is pretty tasty

name: Shellee Vachon
text: Very incompetent staff!  When pizza was ordered, we specifically verified their location but when we got there they had no record of the order. Extremely unorganized!   Didn't make any effort to rectify the situation. Will never do business with them again!

name: Jacob Clendenen
text: Love the crust flavorings! Great deals for good pizza

name: Tiffany Fisher
text: They have been delivering to us for 3 years and now it's out of there range!!! Well apparently we won't be ordering from here anymore!

name: Martha Reinhard
text: Consistently perfect Pizza EVERY TIME. We've been ordering once a month for Ten Years and have never had one single problem.

name: Nick Dangler
text: Piss pour. More than an hour late and no apology.  A waste of money.

name: Jammie Watson
text: Loved the pizza and delivery was fast, nice person bringing it, the whole experance was awesome.

name: Cassandra Williams
text: Ok

name: Janelle Young
text: Friendly, helpful staff!

name: Luke Mellinger
text: Hungry Howie's is the best pizza I've ever had!!! I just wish they had more locations. :)

name: Mixmasta Kanasta
text: Always great. Associates are always friendly.

name: Amy Kintz
text: Love Love Love

name: Audretta Atkins
text: Best pizza in town

name: David Grear
text: I dont eat here

name: bennie wilson

text: This place is seriously declined I would not advise anybody to go there

name: Jordan Ridgeway
text: It beats Domino's, Papa John's, Pizza Hut, you name it.  It's the best fast food pizza you can have delivered.
